item.title: Relatively position elements in CSS
item.description: Positioning elements relative to their container is something that comes up often when writing CSS for a website. You might be trying to position a little triangle under hovered nav links, or place a badge in the top-right corner of your website, both of these are use-cases where you might need to position elements relative to other elements.
